Title: An unusual swelling in the male perineum
Abstract: Copyright 2015 BMJ Publishing Group. All rights reserved.Median raphe cysts are a rare, congenital entity. We present a case and review the literature in respect to a 35-year-old man with a non-visible, painless midline swelling in the anterior perineum initially thought to be a liposarcoma. Subsequent histopathological examination confirmed a median raphe cyst.
